description: This file defines an Angular component for managing users in an admin interface. It displays a list of users with sorting and viewing details functionalities, handles loading data from an admin service, and manages UI states such as modals and error messages.

classes.name: AdminUsersComponent
classes.description: An Angular component for listing and managing users in an admin context.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Initializes the component and triggers data load for users.

methods.name: onSort
methods.description: Handles sorting the user list based on a specified key.

methods.name: openUser
methods.description: Opens a modal to display user details.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches the list of users from the AdminService and updates the component state.

methods.name: sort
methods.description: Sorts the users array based on the active sort key.

ctags.name: User
ctags.pattern: /^    const k = this.sortKey as keyof User;$/

ctags.name: k
ctags.pattern: /^    const k = this.sortKey as keyof User;$/
